hadiths.text: Iyas b. Salama b. Akwa' reported on the authority of his father, saying:We used to observe the Friday prayer with the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ), and when we returned we did not find the shadow of the walls in which we could take protection (from the heat of the sun)

chapter.ara-name: باب صَلاَةِ الْجُمُعَةِ حِينَ تَزُولُ الشَّمْسُ
chapter.eng-name: Jumu`ah prayer is when the sun has passed its zenith
